description: Terminates a specified process by PID and records full contextual details for auditing. Resolves the executable path, attempts a forceful kill (-9), and logs the result including PID, executable path, kill status, and reason. Produces atomic NDJSON output with a .new fallback when the Active Response log is locked.

script_parameters.name: PID
script_parameters.description: Process ID (PID) of the target process to terminate.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).
